mapper.select: SELECT m.mafaSeq ,m.mafaStausCd ,p.prdtName ,pol.pdolQty ,po.pdorNum ,m.mafaRegDate ,m.mafaModDate ,m.mafaNum FROM manufacture AS m LEFT JOIN productorderlist AS pol ON m.productorderlist_pdolSeq = pol.pdolSeq LEFT JOIN product AS p ON pol.product_prdtSeq = p.prdtSeq LEFT JOIN productorder AS po ON pol.productorder_pdorSeq = po.pdorSeq;
